data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On January 17, 2024
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors ('Board') of ICICI Prudential Life Insurance Company Limited has at their meeting, which commenced at 17:07 IST and concluded at 19:54 IST on Wednesday, January 17, 2024, inter alia, approved the following business:
Audited financial statements and financial results (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2023.
Pursuant to the provisions of regulation 33 and regulation 52 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (Listing Regulations) and other applicable requirements, a copy of the audited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2023, together with the Auditors' Report in the prescribed format is enclosed. A copy of the press release being issued in this connection is also enclosed.
Please note that B S R & Co. LLP and Walker Chandiok & Co LLP, the joint statutory auditors of the Company have issued audit reports with unmodified opinion.

data.news_body:
Pursuant to the provisions of regulation 33 and regulation 52 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (Listing Regulations) and other applicable requirements, a copy of the audited financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023, together with the Auditors' Report in the prescribed format is enclosed. data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On April 20, 2023
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors has at its meeting held today, inter alia, approved the following business:
1. Audited financial statements and financial results (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023.
2. Recommendation of final dividend of ? 0.60 per equity share of face value of ? 10 each, to the members of the Company which shall be subject to their approval at the ensuing Annual General Meeting.
3. The re-appointment of Ms. Vibha Paul Rishi as an Independent Director of the Company, for a second term of five consecutive years, with effect from January 1, 2024, till December 31, 2028, subject to approval of the members of the Company.
4. The appointment of Mr. Anuj Bhargava as a Non-executive (Additional) Director of the Company with effect from May 1, 2023, subject to the approval of members of the Company.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On January 18, 2022
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors ('Board') of ICICI Prudential Life Insurance Company Limited has at their meeting, which commenced at 14.30 IST and concluded at 17.25 IST on January 18, 2022 inter alia, approved the audited financial statements and financial results (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter and nine months period ended December 31, 2021.

Pursuant to the provisions of regulation 33, regulation 52 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and other applicable requirements, a copy of the audited financial results for the quarter and nine months period ended December 31, 2021 together with the Auditors' Report in the prescribed format is enclosed. A copy of the press release being issued in this connection is also enclosed.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On Tuesday, July 20, 2021
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors ('Board') of ICICI Prudential Life Insurance Company Limited has at their meeting, inter alia, approved the audited financial statements and financial results (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter ended June 30, 2021.

Pursuant to the provisions of regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and other applicable requirements, a copy of the audited financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2021 together with the Auditors' Report in the prescribed format is enclosed. A copy of the press release being issued in this connection is also enclosed.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body:
Kindly note that Prudential Plc has scheduled a virtual investor day on June 2, 2021.

A video has been made available as part of the virtual showcase on May 28, 2021, covering the Company's overview and strategy.

The aforementioned video can also be accessed on the Company''s website at https://www.iciciprulife.com/about-us/bulletin-board.html?ID=about4 in Investor / Conference Presentations section of the Bulletin Board.

data.caption: Audited Financial Statements And Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2021 Together With Auditors'' Report.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the provisions of regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and other applicable requirements, a copy of the audited financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2021 together with the Auditors' Report in the prescribed format is enclosed. A copy of the press release being issued in this connection is also enclosed.

Please note that BSR & Co. LLP and Walker Chandiok & Co LLP, the joint statutory auditors of the Company, have issued audit reports with unmodified opinion.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On Monday, April 19, 2021
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors ('Board') of ICICI Prudential Life Insurance Company Limited, has, at their meeting, held on Monday, April 19, 2021, inter alia approved the following business:
1) Audited financial statements and financial results (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2021.
Please note that BSR & Co. LLP and Walker Chandiok & Co LLP, the joint statutory auditors of the Company, have issued audit reports with unmodified opinion.
2) Recommendation of final dividend of ?2.00 per equity share of face value of ? 10 each, to the members of the Company which shall be subject to their approval at the ensuing Annual General Meeting.
3) The re-appointment of Mr. Dilip Karnik (DIN: 06419513) as an Independent (Additional) Director of the Company, for another term of five consecutive years, with effect from June 29, 2021 till June 28, 2026, subject to the approval of the members of the Company.
